definition: to double/to redouble/to increase many times over/to multiply by a factor/multiplication

sentences.english: With long-lasting fragrance, double your charm.
sentences.chinese: 香味幽长用后倍增迷人魅力。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 对成年咨询者的侮辱导致有缺陷水龙头成倍增加。

sentences.english: As oil prices skyrocketed, Gaddafi and his family suddenly had more money than they knew what to do with.
sentences.chinese: 得利于油价的飙升，卡扎菲家族身价倍增。

sentences.english: Friendships multiply joys and divide griefs.
sentences.chinese: 友谊倍增欢乐，分担悲愁。

sentences.english: With delicate fragrance, it can double your charm.
sentences.chinese: 香味幽长，用后倍增迷人魅力。

sentences.english: The support and encouragement from his boss doubled his confidence on the job.
sentences.chinese: 老板的支持和鼓励让他对工作信心倍增。

sentences.english: One method of measuring fluorescence by multiplier phototube is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种用光电倍增管测量荧光的方法。

sentences.english: Place the multiplier in the beaker and fill with Heptane until multiplier is fully immersed.
sentences.chinese: 将倍增器放入烧杯中并倒入正庚烷直至浸没倍增器。

sentences.english: Place the multiplier in the beaker and fill with Heptane until multiplier is fully immersed.
sentences.chinese: 将倍增器放入烧杯中并倒入正庚烷直至浸没倍增器。

sentences.english: And so it builds up and takes off exponentially.
sentences.chinese: 因此它会建立起来，成倍增长。

sentences.english: This is a global scale factor applied to the irradiance contribution of the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个全局倍增的因素应用于辐射贡献的环境。

sentences.english: Our ability to innovate is increasing exponentially as the years go by.
sentences.chinese: 我们的创新能力会随着岁月之流逝而倍增。

sentences.english: The possibility of hurting should inspire an augmentation of respect.
sentences.chinese: 不慎触及了可能触及之物应倍增尊敬。

sentences.english: Assuming this no-holds-barred approach will add to the spontaneity factor of having sex outside the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 它让卧室之外的性爱倍增狂野激情。

sentences.english: But the computational cost is much higher with the multi-block modes being used.
sentences.chinese: 但随着模式选择的增多，算法计算量成倍增加。

sentences.english: A circuit for taking out timing signal from one dynode of photomultiplier is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种从光电倍增管倍增极引出快信号的电路。

definition: to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
lit. like a tiger that has grown wings/with redoubled power (idiom)
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
to advance by leaps and bounds
to clamber up/(of prices etc) to rise
